00021 typedef unsigned char byte;

00038 typedef sint sidx_t;
00039 
00040 typedef suint ptr_t;
00041 #elif defined(__x86_64__)

00059 #ifndef SYLPH_LIKELY
00060     #if __GNUC__ - 0 >= 3
00061         #define SYLPH_LIKELY(x) __builtin_expect(!!(x),1)
00062         #define SYLPH_UNLIKELY(x) __builtin_expect(!!(x),0)
00063     #else
00064         #define SYLPH_LIKELY(x) (x)
00065         #define SYLPH_UNLIKELY(x) (x)
00066     #endif
00067 #endif

00070 #define SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,Type) extern template class Class<Type>
00071 
00072 #define SYLPH_SPECIALIZE_PRIMS(Class) \
00073     SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,byte); \
00074     SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,sint); \
00075     SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,suint); \
00076     SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,slong); \
00077     SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,sulong); \
00078     SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,bool); \
00079     SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,float); \
00080     SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,double); \
00081     SYLPH_SPECIALIZE(Class,::Sylph::String)
00082
